CardNames.1:
Construction Union

Q: When do you collect the action card?
A: At the end of the round, after all players have finished their turns.

Q: Can this be stolen once it has been played but not resolved?
A: Only cards in the holder's play area can be stolen, so once played this card cannot be stolen.
CardNames.4:
Skirmishers

Q: Can I reroll this multiple times?
A: No, only once.
CardNames.5:
Arms Union

Q: When do you collect the action card?
A: At the end of the round, after all players have finished their turns.

Q: Can this be stolen once it has been played but not resolved?
A: Only cards in the holder's play area can be stolen, so once played this card cannot be stolen.
CardNames.6:
Lattice Spies

Q: Can I discard this even if I cannot seize?
A: Yes. Any card that says you can discard it to do something else can simply be discarded.
CardNames.9:
Elder Broker

Q: Is Trade blocked by Sworn Guardians?
A: The Trade action is not stealing and is not blocked by Sworn Guardians.
CardNames.11:
Council Intrigue

Q: Can I flip the Council while it is not in the Court?
A: Yes! In this case, return it to the Court. It won't resolve this round.
CardNames.12:
Diplomatic Fiasco

Q: Do you count agents before or after returning the agents that were on this card?
A: In this instance, the agents should be returned first, then the supply counted.
